column4: that's me also... about 10+ days into it and I've totally replaced my desktop with ubuntu
My biggest problem is I am still stuck on dialup! lol
I'm learning fast... just set up a 400 gig drive, copied over 50 gigs from my laptop and rsync'ed it to another 400 gig drive for safe keeping
sorry to hear that.  my cable connection gets about 560k/sec
